00034 #include <string>
00035 #include <map>
00036 #include <utility>
00037 #include <list>
00038 #include <iostream>
00039 #include <stdexcept>
00040 #include <cctype>
00041 
00042 #include "lower.h"
00043 #include "sys.h"
00044 #include "cautoresp.h"
00045 
00046 using namespace std;
00047 
00048 cautoresp *autoresp = NULL; 
00049 
00050 void usage(const char *me) {
00051     cout<<"usage: "<<me<<" message [headers]"<<endl
00052         <<endl
00053         <<"Program generates reply on incoming message. It should"<<endl
00054         <<"be executed by qmail-local (man dot-qmail)."<<endl
00055         <<"It takes two or three arguments - code page name, hexadecimal "<<endl
00056         <<"representation of message which will be send as a"<<endl
00057         <<"response; second argument can be hexadecimal representation of "<<endl
00058         <<"headers which should be placed in new message (some of them are"<<endl
00059         <<"overwritten with values from original message)."<<endl;
00060 }
00061 
00066 template <class T> void hdr_array2map( const T & array, 
00067         cautoresp::map_hdr_val & map ) {
00068 
00069     // insert values into map (map header name to its value)
00070     pair<cautoresp::map_hdr_val::key_type,cautoresp::map_hdr_val::data_type> 
00071             hdr_val_item;
00072 
00073     string::size_type sep_pos, field_len;
00074     for( typename T::const_iterator field=array.begin(), fend=array.end(); 
00075             field!=fend; ++field ) {
00076 
00077         sep_pos = field->find(':');
00078         if(sep_pos == string::npos) continue; // ignore incorrect lines
00079         hdr_val_item.first = lower(field->substr(0, sep_pos));
00080 
00081         field_len = field->length();
00082         if( field_len > sep_pos ) {
00083                 if( field_len > sep_pos+1
00084                     && isspace((*field)[sep_pos+1]) )
00085                         hdr_val_item.second = field->substr(sep_pos+2);
00086                 else hdr_val_item.second = field->substr(sep_pos+1);
00087         } else hdr_val_item.second = "";
00088         map[hdr_val_item.first] = hdr_val_item.second;// last takes precedence
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00095 cautoresp::map_hdr_val input_read() {
00096     cautoresp::map_hdr_val hdr_val;
00097     list<string> hdrs;
00098     string ln;
00099     
00100     // read in headers
00101     while(getline(cin, ln)) {
00102             if(ln.empty()) break;
00103             if( isspace(ln[0]) ) hdrs.back() += ln;
00104             else hdrs.push_back(ln);
00105     }
00106     if(cin.bad()) throw runtime_error("error while reading input");
00107 
00108     hdr_array2map< list<string> >( hdrs, hdr_val );
00109     return hdr_val;
00110 }
00111 
00118 int main(int ac , char **av) {
00119     try {
00120             if( ac < 3 || ac > 4 ) {
00121                     usage(*av);
00122                     return 111;
00123             }
00124 
00125             autoresp = cautoresp::alloc();
00126             autoresp->codepage_set(av[1]);
00127             autoresp->msg_set(hex_from(av[2]));
00128             
00129             if( ac == 4 ) {
00130                     list<string> hdrs;
00131                     cautoresp::map_hdr_val add_hdr_val;
00132                     string str = hex_from(av[3]);
00133                     string::size_type beg=0, pos;
00134                     for(; (pos=str.find('\n', beg)) != string::npos; beg = pos+1) {
00135                             hdrs.push_back(str.substr(beg, pos-beg));
00136                     }
00137                     hdrs.push_back(str.substr(beg));
00138                     hdr_array2map< list<string> >(hdrs, add_hdr_val);
00139                     autoresp->hdrs_add_set(add_hdr_val);
00140             }
00141             autoresp->reply(input_read());
00142             return 0; 
00143     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00144             cout<<"autoresp: exception: "<<e.what()<<endl;
00145             return 111;
00146     }
00147 }
